REST API

Detailed documentation for all REST API endpoints.

class zombie_detector.api.rest.HostData(*, dynatrace_host_id, hostname, Recent_CPU_decrease_criterion, Recent_net_traffic_decrease_criterion, Sustained_Low_CPU_criterion, Excessively_constant_RAM_criterion, Daily_CPU_profile_lost_criterion, report_date=None, tenant=None, asset_tag=None, pending_decommission=None, Recent_CPU_decrease_value=None, Recent_net_traffic_decrease_value=None, Sustained_Low_CPU_value=None, Excessively_constant_RAM_value=None, Daily_CPU_profile_lost_value=None)[source]

async zombie_detector.api.rest.detect_zombies(request)[source]

Detect zombie hosts based on performance criteria.

  • hosts: List of host data objects with performance metrics

  • states: Optional criterion states configuration (0=inactive, 1=active)

  • options: Detection options (zombies_only, include_summary)

Parameters:

request (DetectionRequest)

async zombie_detector.api.rest.health_check()[source]

Health check endpoint.

async zombie_detector.api.rest.get_default_states()[source]

Get default criterion states configuration.

async zombie_detector.api.rest.get_criteria_info()[source]

Get information about zombie detection criteria.

async zombie_detector.api.rest.get_killed_zombies(since_hours=Query(24))[source]

Get zombies that were killed (resolved) in the specified time period.

  • since_hours: Hours to look back (1-168, default: 24)

Parameters:

since_hours (int)

async zombie_detector.api.rest.check_zombie_killed(zombie_id)[source]

Check if a specific zombie was killed (resolved).

  • zombie_id: Dynatrace host ID to check

Parameters:

zombie_id (str)

async zombie_detector.api.rest.get_zombie_lifecycle(zombie_id)[source]

Get the complete lifecycle information for a specific zombie.

  • zombie_id: Dynatrace host ID to get lifecycle for

Parameters:

zombie_id (str)

async zombie_detector.api.rest.get_tracking_stats()[source]

Get current zombie tracking statistics (new, persisting, killed).

async zombie_detector.api.rest.cleanup_zombie_data(days_to_keep=Query(30))[source]

Clean up old zombie tracking data.

  • days_to_keep: Number of days of data to keep (1-365, default: 30)

Parameters:

days_to_keep (int)
